content: 18st 3 rnds slip_stitch into next st f o leave long tail for sewing leg ruffle attach light gray with a slip_stitch into one of the front loops left in round 7 chain 2 half_double_crochet increase into each st around slip_stitch to join into the top of the 1st half_double_crochet fo weave in end tail in orange 1 6sc into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3-30 single_crochet around 28 rounds of 12 single_crochet ears make 2 in orange 1 4sc into magic_ring 2 increase single_crochet around 6 3 increase single_crochet around 9 4 increase single_crochet x2 around 12 5 increase single_crochet x3 around 15 6-7 single_crochet around for 2 rounds slip_stitch into next st f o leave tail for sewing pompoms in red make 5 3 for the body 2 for the feet 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase single_crochet around 9 3 decrease single_crochet around 6 fo leave tail for sewing collar in white 1 chain 19 turn single_crochet 18 across 2 chain 2 turn blo double_crochet increase across 36 3 turn the piece don t make any chains here working back down the other side into the unused loops from round 2 double_crochet increase across 36 fo leave tail to sew ends together assembly weave in ends as you go head i prefer to do everything on the head before sewing pieces together eyes are placed between rounds 11 & 12 9 stitches apart the nose is centered 2 rounds below the eyes stitch it on with red yarn in an upside down triangle using red thread stitch on a small mouth about 2-3 rounds below the nose and the make-up lines up by the eyes ears are placed about 7-8 rounds above the eyes body stuff the body firmly but not so full that it stretches out the stitches try to keep the bottom flatter while stuffing to help kitty be able to sit upright sew head to body using the tail from the head and stitching through the front loops left from the last row of the head sew three pompoms on the front of the body legs use red thread to stitch a single line at the top of the ruffle stuff legs full but not firm sew the legs to the body in line with the eyes the bottom of the leg should be sewn on at round 5-6 sew a pompom onto each foot just below the leg ruffle arms use red thread to stitch a single line at the top of the ruffle stuff the paws the very lightly stuff the arms flatten the open end place arms on the side of the body directly below the head somewhat in line with the ear sew through both layers the paws should rest nicely between the legs tail do not stuff the tail sew tail to the butt with the underside sewn at the same round as the bottoms of the legs collar collar goes around the neck sew the ends together
